summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Jes Staley, Lawrence Krauss, and Curtis Marean regarding a workshop on Human Uniqueness and Behavioral Modernity. The email includes an invitation and agenda for the workshop, along with attachments for participants to review. It highlights the collaborative nature of the workshop and the involvement of various disciplines.
